petNameAdd:
1) State Of Assam
    Advocate - Tapan Kumar Bhattacharya

business_details.Business: Accused Ashok Bhaduri Ashramik has been produced from jail hajot. Seen the accused.Accused is heard on the point of sentence u/s 235 (2) Cr.P.C.The accused has submitted that he has aged ailing mother to look after and he is the sole bread earner, so prayed for taking lenient view.Considered all aspects. Accordingly, the accused is convicted and sentenced R.I for 7 years with fine Rs. 3000/- in default of fine he shall undergo R.I for another period for 2 (two) months  u/s 4 of POCSO Act. Accused is further sentenced to pay fine Rs. 500/- in default of fine he shall undergo R.I for 15 days u/s 447 I.P.C.Set off the previous hazotee period, if any.Let a free copy of Judgment and order be given to the accused.The case is disposed of.
